quoteText: Brilliant reserves the right to, in its sole discretion, remove any User Submission(s) at any time (with or without notice).
title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use state that "Brilliant reserves the right to, in its sole discretion, remove any User Submission(s) at any time (with or without notice)."
